column1: #text=A couple of days ago I decided my hair was getting a little to long , so I went to get my hair cut .
#text=I go to an old-fashioned barber , not a hair salon , so I did n't need to make an appointment .
#text=I just drove there , parked and walked in the door .
#text=There was only one person ahead of me , so I did n't have to wait too long .
#text=I read a magazine while he finished the other person , then got into the chair .
#text=As usual , he asked how I wanted it cut and I told him to do it the same way as always .
#text=Maybe someday I 'll surprise him and ask for a mohawk or something , but not today .
#text=He went to work with the scissors while we talked a little about sports teams .
#text=It did n't take too long before he was done with the cutting and used the electric trimmer to make everything neat .
#text=I go to an old enough barber that he actually finishes up with a hot towel and neck massage , which is always nice .
#text=I paid him and headed home a lot neater looking then I was before .
